name: Awesomenauts
summary: Two teams battle each other to take down the opposing sides turrets and base. There's multiple stages and some with hidden traps in the environment. Each team defends multiple lanes, and has to plan and coordinate properly to take down the other team.

name: Awesomenauts Assemble!
summary:
Awesomenauts Assemble! is a conversion of the PC 2D multiplayer online battle arena game Awesomenauts for the PS4/Xbox One.

Awesomenauts is a MOBA fitted into the form of an accessible 3-on-3 action platformer. Head out to the online battlefields together with your friends as an online party or in local split screen, and never worry about having to wait for an online match because of drop-in matchmaking!

Devise strategies as you upgrade and customize each character's skills to suit your playing style.

name: Awesome
summary: Awesome is a science fiction action video game released by Psygnosis for the Amiga and Atari ST in 1990. It features a variety of gameplay styles, from overhead shooting to Asteroids-esque sequences, and a pre-rendered ray-traced intro sequence. The antagonist of the game is John Winner. Scenes and music from the game were featured in Psygnosis's later game Lemmings as in-jokes, in a Taxing rated level called "What an AWESOME level". The theme music for Awesome was composed by Tim Wright. The box art for Awesome was painted by science fiction artist John Harris.

name: A Wizard's Lizard
summary:
A Wizard's Lizard is an ever-changing medieval fantasy hack 'n slash game from independent game developers, Lost Decade Games.

Conquer the forces of Death in A Wizard’s Lizard, an action RPG for Windows, Mac and Linux. Explore ever-changing dungeons, filled with valuable treasure and powerful items, while battling back the hordes of evil. Rescue townsfolk to improve your town and aid your next trek into the dungeon.

You'll die constantly, and painfully in the heat of battle. However you'll want to use Death as a mechanism for complete and full exploration of each unique dungeon as your character enters the Realm of the Dead. Herein, you'll find additional loot and continue your quest as you fight stronger monsters, quite a few of which were killed by your living counterpart.

Look for Townfolk, Chests, exotic Weapons and glorious Treasure, both as alive or dead, and fight Monsters for glory as a wizard or a lizard.

name: Awesome Golf
summary: Awesome Golf is as the name suggests, a golf simulator. There are 3 courses to play: one in the U.K one in the U.S and the third one in Japan. The gameplay involves you lining up your shot via an overhead view which when set up switches to a third person view. Whilst in this view you need to swing the club and stop it at the desired power and then stop it on the correct symbol to get the perfect hit. If you don't get it right you will either miss the ball or hit the earth. There are 14 clubs at your disposal, 8 irons, 3 woods 2 wedges and a putter which are selected by moving the hand cursor over your Golf bag and selecting the desired club.

name: A Walk in the Dark
summary: In this action platformer you play as a cat, Bast, running through a dark fantasy world. You’ll be running, jumping and sliding with smooth and precise controls designed to make you feel like a cat. But it wont be easy. In the dark you never know what lies in the shadows. In this dark journey you will face strange creatures and dangerous traps.

name: Aware
summary: You are stranded on an island, The plane you came with have crashed, and you are alive. To survive on the island you'll have to find food, water and shelter. It's up to you. Do you have the knowledge to know what you can eat or not? Are you faster alone but maybe stronger as a team?

name: Awareness Rooms
summary:
You find yourself in a room you know nothing of. As you examine the objects around you, your awareness rises and the room slowly comes into focus.
Can you find your way out?

name: Awe
summary: Awe is a god-game about expressing one’s creativity by shaping and building planets’ ecosystems in a soothing and relaxing ambiance carried by beautiful, minimalist lowpoly 3D art style and atmospheric music.

name: A World of Keflings
summary: Play as a giant to help the tiny Keflings build up and beautify their Kingdom. Start out small, unlocking new blueprints, buildings and tasks as you work towards designing and building a Kefling castle. Create your own private world, or construct a kingdom with your friends online!

name: Away: Shuffle Dungeon
summary: Introducing an epic new role playing saga from the minds of renowned RPG visionaries. When an entire village is “spirited away” by an unknown malevolence, only one hero remains to unravel the mystery and rebuild a torn community.

name: A.W. Phoenix Festa
summary: In this action RPG game, play the events of The Asterisk War animation series! Live the life of hero Ayato Amagiri and experience Rikka Academy and the Phoenix Festa storyline. Players will go through simulated high school experiences while fighting in over the top tournaments.

name: A Wizard's Lizard: Soul Thief
summary: A hardcore rogue-lite action RPG where you possess and play as monsters. Narrowly avoid death as you explore challenging, ever-changing dungeons, and possess any body you can to survive!

name: Awkward Dimensions
summary: They may be Awkward Dimensions, but they're my dreams.

name: Awkward Dimensions Redux
summary:
They may be awkward dimensions, but they're my dreams...

Interactive Dream Journal & Diary; Awkward Dimensions Redux is a personal game. Lasts 20 minutes to an hour with less traditional interaction. Focuses on getting to understand another person through an interpretation of their dreams, thoughts, fears, desires, and past work. It's a game about conversing with roosters, disembodied legs, standardized tests, Immature jokes, relationships, art, espionage, and a teenager coming to terms with life and growing up.

name: A Witch's Tale
summary: A young witch-in-training named Liddell unleashes an ancient evil known as the Eld Witch while searching for powerful magic. The Eld Witch plunges the world into chaos with her monstrous forces, so Liddell, with the help of her vampire companion Loue, sets off to make things right. Players draw magical runes to combat the creatures they encounter in turn-based RPG battles with status effects and elements to consider. Along the way through these fairy tale kingdoms, Liddell receives help in battle from magical dolls she collects. Exploring dungeons and solving puzzles brings her closer to ridding the kingdoms of the curse of the Eld Witch, but she must take care of her dolls assistants along the way to ensure they can help her in combat.

name: A Wolf in Autumn
summary: A dark, surreal psychological horror game, in which a young girl finds herself locked in a shed, in the middle of an idyllic autumn forest.

name: Awaken
summary: Set in beautiful worlds and designed solely for VR, Awaken is a captivating puzzle game and rhythmic music experience. Become an architect of light, awaken the universe and bring back the stars. Awaken features both a campaign mode and a level creation mode to build puzzles and challenge friends.

name: Away: Journey to the Unexpected
summary:
Away: Journey to the Unexpected is a colorful first person adventure game that combines action, negotiation and rogue-lite elements

Progress through the levels and the story, choose your path, but above all, recruit allies. All the strange characters you meet in game can be played in first person, and it’s up to you to find the right answers to get them to join your team!

Idiotic workmen, mysteries from outer space, oddball friends, and fast combat await!

name: Awkward Todd
summary:
Awkward Todd is a game about social anxiety disorder. 
 
Avoid eye contact by maneuvering around people in a claustrophobic environment. 
 
Make small talk by typing out randomly generated phrases of escalating difficulty. 
 
Keep it together for as long as possible before the inevitable panic attack.

name: Awakening: The Golden Age - Collector's Edition
summary: When Minotaur attack, only you can save the day.

name: Awesome Obstacle Challenge
summary: Show off your mad Awesome Obstacle Challenge skills in a VR-ONLY race to the finish. Run, climb, and leap your way through dozens of courses to see if you can finish on top of the global charts. Climb walls, nets, and ropes. Traverse high canyons. Dodge lasers, fire and more!

name: A Week of Circus Terror
summary:
A hand-drawn, point & click indie horror game about the haunted house and his owner.
During the day, you have to search for some informations, but when the night comes, you have to understand, why are the possessed toys trying to kill you. You have to find a way to go through them and save your life!

name: Awakened
summary: In this indie horror game dubbed - Awakened, you'll be playing sidescroller levels, first person view 3D environments, top down stealth levels, puzzles and more. You see, it's a series of minigames within the game and they're all tied together by a growing and riveting storyline that'll entertain you, challenge you, scare you, and keep you guessing!

name: Awakening: The Sunhook Spire - Collector's Edition
summary: Join Queen Sophia on her adventures in the Sunhook Spire!

name: AWA
summary: A fast paced shoot-em-up featuring modern military aircraft. Choose one of the eight fighter aircraft and take the battle to the skies throughout nine action-packed stages each with their own end-level special boss.

name: Awakening: The Redleaf Forest - Collector's Edition
summary: The final adventure concludes here!

name: A Wild Catgirl Appears!
summary: A Wild Catgirl Appears is a short romance visual novel featuring multiple routes, different girls to date and of course, catgirls! You follow the story of Ami, a loner at high school, as she joins the school's coding club and sets about making her first video game.

name: Awake
summary: Your goal? To survive! Explore the island and tame the wilderness! Find food and drink, collect resources and craft!

name: A Wise Use of Time
summary: With the power to freeze time, you can ransack a casino, rescue a celebrity, or cheat death itself! A thrilling interactive sci-fi novel.

name: A Way Out
summary: From the creators of Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons comes A Way Out, an exclusively co-op adventure where you play the role of one of two prisoners making their daring escape from prison. What begins as a thrilling breakout quickly turns into an unpredictable, emotional adventure unlike anything seen or played before. A Way Out is an experience that must be played with two players. Each player controls one of the main characters, Leo and Vincent, in a reluctant alliance to break out of prison and gain their freedom.

name: Awesome Machine
summary:
Engineer your way through awesome levels.  
Use technology, trampolines and many other tools. 
Discover what it takes to be a scientist and build the Awesome Machine!

name: Aworg: Hero in the Sky
summary: Aworg: Hero in the Sky is an action game for the Sega Mega Drive, released exclusively in Japan via the Sega Game Toshokan service.

name: Awesome Possum Kicks Dr. Machino's Butt
summary:
In just a few years, mankind has succeeded in destroying the environment and endangering all living species. Under the guidance of the evil Dr. Machino, robotic machines were built to turn the Earth into a soulless place without live nature. There is only one hero who can save the living beings of the planet - you, a little possum. Fight Dr. Machino's robots and liberate the Earth!

This is an action platformer very similar in gameplay style to Sonic games. The possum can jump and run very quickly, as well as spin to hurt the enemies and breeze through the levels. Various robotic creatures will will try to kill you during your journey to Dr. Machino's lair. You can either avoid or try to defeat them on your way.

name: A Writer and His Daughter
summary:
A Writer And His Daughter is a story exploration game. The game takes place in two interwoven worlds: reality and a fairy tale. Embark on a journey through both worlds and find out how and why they are connected.

The game is the first part of a trilogy.

name: Awakening: The Goblin Kingdom - Collector's Edition
summary: After overcoming the Dreamless Castle and Moonfell Wood, you have come to the rugged, mountainous snow-peaked Goblin Kingdom!

name: A War Story
summary: A War Story is Single-Player Story Mode and Multiplayer Deathmatch Low Poly a War Game!

name: Awari
summary: A simple numbers-based puzzle game for 8-bit computers where the computer acts as a second player.

name: Awakening: The Redleaf Forest
summary: A hidden object puzzle adventure game.

name: Awakening: The Sunhook Spire
summary: A hidden object puzzle adventure game.

name: Awakening: The Golden Age
summary: A hidden object puzzle adventure game.

name: Awakening of Heroes
summary: Awakening of Heroes is an indie MOBA game that presents some ordinary folks who suddenly realize that each one of them can awaken the hero within.

name: Awesome Shapes
summary: Adventure in space that is all about friendship.

name: Awakening: The Goblin Kingdom
summary: Awakening: The Goblin Kingdom is the third game in the Awakening series.

name: Awakening: Moonfell Wood
summary: Awakening: Moonfell Wood is the second game in the Awakening Series. Awakening: Moonfell Wood is an adventure / hidden object game developed by Boomzap Entertainment, published by Big Fish Games.

name: Aw Nutz
summary: Have you ever wanted to be a nut? How about a pistachio? Well, now you can! Choose from a wide variety of legumes and assorted nuts as you try flinging into the mouths of your enemies. Play with friends or with complete strangers as 1 human with nut allergies vs. 5 nuts!

name: Awakening: The Dreamless Castle
summary: Awakening: The Dreamless Castle is an adventure / hidden object game developed by Boomzap Entertainment.

name: A Wizard's Odyssey
summary: A Wizard's Odyssey is an XNA community game

name: A Week of Garfield: Garfield no Isshukan
summary:
A Week of Garfield is a 1989 Family Computer title based on the comic character Garfield. It was only released in Japan due to issues with using the Garfield license in North America and Europe. It is the third video game to be based on Jim Davis' Garfield Comics

The game is a sidescrolling action game in which enemies can be mice, spiders, birds and other assorted animals. Garfield's default attack is a low judo-style kick when he is standing on his hind feet. There are also several powerups that are limited to how many Garfield has the ability to pick up. A time limit prevents players from wandering aimlessly throughout the level looking for power-ups.

name: Awesum Plus
summary: The object of the game is to guide and place a pair of falling number cubes onto other cubes below so that the single digits assigned to each cube, when added together, equal the game's predetermined "AWEsum".

name: A Walk in the Park
summary: A Walk In The Park

name: Away: The Survival Series
summary: Inspired by nature documentaries, Away: The Survival Series takes you on the Sugar Glider's breathtaking journey into the wild. As cataclysmic storms bear down on the planet, immerse yourself in nature and explore a vibrant world brimming with life, but beware of the dangers that lie ahead...

name: Awsome Metal Detecting
summary: Metal Detecting

name: AWS Argentina Wingshooting Simulator
summary: Play for the very first time the most real simulator ever made for wing shooting in South-american scenery. Feel the real game in the best spots of the Argentinean marshes shooting the most variety of real ducks.

name: A Wonder
summary:
A WONDER is a 3rd person stealth/puzzle game set in a sunken city. 
Stuck in the depths of the sea, Alana will have to explore this dormant world in order to reactivate it. 
In doing so, she must remain hidden from lurking creatures, hostile to any outsider who dares to venture in this derelict place.

name: Awe of Despair
summary: Awe of Despair is a survival horror game which puts you in the shoes of a man who decides to ignore the stigma of the number 13. The goal of this game is to provide the player with a deeply immersive horror experience. You will run into disturbing creatures, discover new weapons, and solve puzzles as you battle your way out of this parallel world.

name: Awesome Metal Detecting
summary: Awesome Metal Detecting

name: Awesome Tank
summary: Awesome Tank is an XNA community game

name: A Walk Along the Wall
summary:
Bosses of great scale and challenge. 
A small yet potent arsenal. 
A wickedly unique soundtrack. 
Go forth and kick their teeth in.

name: Award. Room of fear
summary: Solve a riddle of damned family and do not forget to survive at the same time.

name: Awakening: The Skyward Castle - Collector's Edition
summary: Discover the fate of your exiled kingdom, save your people, and end the ancient evil that started it all!

name: Awesomenauts Assemble!: Fully Loaded Pack
summary:
This bundle was released after the game migrate to Free-To-Play and it contains:

- Awesomenauts Assemble!
- Character Ted McPain
- Character Sentry X-58
- Character Skree
- Character Penny Fox
- Character Nibbs
- Character Professor M. Yoolip
- Character Chucho Krokk
- Character Jimmy & the LUX5000
- Character Max Focus
- Character Dizzy
- Character Smiles
- Character Commander Rocket
- Character Qi'Tara

name: Awaken: Gunpowder Adventurer Daydream
summary: Awaken as an action RPG game has a wealth of levels and a variety of way to play. We hope that players who love this type of game can experience the core content of the game as well as the overall story of the game.

name: A Walk in the Woods
summary: A Walk in the Woods is a co-op multiplayer game where four players must roam a dark and dangerous forest in search of each other, avoid a terrifying creature, and reunite before the curse is complete!

name: Awkward
summary: At the end of the 1800s, the government declared a global ban on this legendary card game due to an increase in bar fights, divorces, and family feuds. It was political correctness gone mad.

name: Awakening of Celestial
summary: Awakening of Celestial is a magical fantasy Visual Novel filled with exciting adventures, epic moments, complex characters, and many more! Developed by Celestial Project and the platform will be PC.

name: Awesome Space Delivery Company
summary: You are a space delivery boy, flying your spaceship and making deliveries. You control your ship by tapping on the two sides of your screen. Flying around the levels making deliveries earns you money and you can use that money to upgrade your ship and unlock new planets to visit.

name: Away From Earth: Mars
summary:
What is the line between genius and crazy? Genius people has a opportunity to perform their crazy ideas to real. 
A Game that you'll see if can you make Elon Musk's Creating Mars Colony dream as real in 2055 or just die as a normal human...

name: Awesome Pea
summary: Help the greedy Pea to make his way through a string of levels filled with deadly traps and cute but dangerous enemies and collect all the coins to which he can only reach!

name: Awesome Animated Monster Maker: Ultra Edition
Awesomenauts Overdrive
summary: A second paid DLC for Awesomenauts featuring a few new characters and a graphical update for the character Sheriff Lonestar.

name: Awesomenauts Starstorm
summary: Awesomenauts: Starstorm is DLC for Awesomenauts. It adds five new characters: Ted McPain, Sentry, Skree, Penny Fox, and Nibbs, and three in-game tracks: "Sirens before the Storm", "Spanking Stars", and "I'll make you a Star, Baby".

name: Awkward Date Hero
summary:
You may be awkward, but so are they. This is your last resort for finding someone
right for you. There are only five girls left, can at least one of them tolerate your nonsense?

name: A Winter's Daydream
summary: A boy returns to his countryside home after spending half a year in the city, only to discover the unimaginable — his elderly grandmother has transformed into a cute young girl! Hijinks ensue.

name: Awake Episode One
summary: Harry is a prisoner in his own house, obsessed with discovering the truth behind a recurring dream and a cryptic message within it. The arrival of a new presence promises to save Harry from his darkness and unlock the potential of humanity’s future.

name: A Way to Slay
summary:
A Way To Slay is a bloody puzzle game in which you will need tactics and logical thinking.
You will face knights, samurai, mercenaries, pirates, orcs, assassins and even the modern mafia.
Think over the strategy of combat and pass hundreds of different levels in a variety of eras, from realistic to fantasy worlds.

name: Away From Earth: Moon
summary: The world is in danger. Our water is running out. Our world is running out. As a player, you need to make moon as livable and invite humans from world to moon. By doing that, you need to use your engineer abilities to make water&electric systems of Moon.

name: Awake: Definitive Edition
summary: It was supposed to be a romantic trip… but turned into a brutal murder scene. When Marc and Caroline planned their romantic getaway, they didn’t know that it would turn their lives into jeopardy. Can you find a way to prevent this terrible crime and put the murderer to justice?

name: Away from beauty
summary: Away from beauty is a color feast, a piece of art that struggles with sexualism and colorism.

name: A way up!
summary: A way up! is a simple platformer about throwing a rock. WARNING - you may find it really hard.

name: Award Winners: Platinum Edition
summary:
This compilation contains the following games:

- Frontier: Elite II
- Lemmings
- Sid Meier's Civilization

name: Away From Earth: Titan
summary: Our world is in danger. Our water is finishing...Currently, as a astronaut we've a mission...Going to Titan and making there as liveable. As player, you'll be astronaut and your mission will be creating a ecosystem on titan and bringing people from world to titan.

name: Awaiting Salvation
summary: Explore the village and find out what's happened recently. Prepare the cures to save the villagers. Get ready for the mission! You have been chosen as a savior of the village.

name: Awesome taxi
summary: Awesome Taxi - This is an arcade game in which the player assumes the role of a space taxi driver.

name: Away From Earth: Titan 2
summary: After Titan try, The world is still in danger. Our water is running out. Our world is running out. As a player, you need to make Titan as livable and invite humans from world to Titan. By doing that, you need to use your engineer abilities to make water&electric systems of Titan. You're last luck of humanity...

name: A World With No Colour
summary: Introducing the first ever First Person Colouring game. A great start for aspiring gamers. Bring life to the colourless world with your mighty colour canon.

name: A Witch's Word
summary: Years ago, you sold your first born to a witch. But with your recent dating history, it doesn't look like she'll be getting her end of the bargain any time soon. So the witch has offered to help you find a suitable someone to settle down with. Will you choose the sweet farmer, the confident writer, or the brooding bladesmith? And are these really your only options?

name: Awesome Pea 2
summary:
Greedy Pea is back in game! Dark dungeons, deadly traps, everything is green, a lot of gold everywhere!

Awesome Pea 2 - next chapter of classic platformer game. Greedy Pea is back in game! Now even more dark dungeons, deadly traps and gold!

name: A Wild Time Travelling Clone Dancing
summary: Have you ever wished you had an interactive comic book? Have you ever wonder what would a Comic Book video game look like? Well, that's ''A Wild Time Travelling Clone Dancing''!

name: Awaken the Time
summary: One entity different bodies, different time zones, one storyline but different background stories in different time periods.

name: A Week in the Cold
summary: Traverse the cold slippery ice by sliding and skating while trying to avoid both pesky penguins and ghostly wolves. All the while moving between campfires trying to stay warm.

name: A Walk in the Woods: VR
summary:
Are you quarantined at home - getting lazy and bored? Throw your beer and chips aside! Put on your VR helmet and go for a walk in the summer forest!
P.S. And if you use a pine scent freshener, the effect will be twice as strong)

Evening. Forest. A relaxing walk...

There are no monsters, no riddles, no need to defeat anyone or chase after anyone here - - it is not that type of game. It is a virtual escape where you can hide from the monotonous daily routine and enjoy the nature.

name: Awaken: Underwater Odyssey
summary:
Awaken: Underwater Odyssey is vertical scrolling shoot em up game. Game takes place in far future on planet Neptune. You are member of Kraken squad, which is stationed inside a Leviathan class carrier craft owned by RPE corporation which oversees gas extracting operations on Neptune. 
 
The game is about annihilating thousands of squid like aliens while you pilot an Orca MK II submarine which is highly customizable to fit your style.

name: A Wish Upon A Star
summary:
The game was created for the seventh Wizard Jam, a bi-annual Idle Thumbs community-run game jam that runs for two weeks.

Follow a small child with great imagination and one big wish on the way to make it happen.

Find a path through colorful puzzles and meet people who are more than happy to help!

name: A woman goes to a private games industry party
Awexome Cross
summary: You control a little yellow dog-thing stuffed inside a tire in this sidescroller. Get to the end and a trophy could be yours.

name: Away
summary: Away - is a short game telling about the hero's death experience, performed in a gloomy black and white style.

name: Awesome Pea Collection
summary:
Contains 2 retro-style platformer in one compilation!

Awesome Pea
Help the greedy Pea make his way through a string of levels filled with deadly traps and cute (but dangerous) enemies and collect all the coins he can reach!

Awesome Pea 2
Awesome Pea 2 is the next chapter in the classic platformer saga, now with even more dark dungeons, deadly traps, and lots of gold!

name: Awakened: Dark Space
summary: Awakened: Dark Space is an adventure indie game that's a unique fusion between medieval, present and sci-fi. Go on a search to find your friend Sara who went missing in a mysterious area called Crystal Woods which is rumored to be cursed for over 800 years, since a certain incident.

name: A Walk Among the Wild Garlic
summary: A tiny pixelated time-capsule made with Bitsy v0 for the Bitsy Classic jam.

name: A Wake Inn
summary: Put your VR goggles on to explore dark corridors of an abandoned hotel using realistically controlled wheelchair, and face strange army of living dolls. But you won't be alone - mysterious voice will accompany you via shortwave transmitter. Just make sure, who really pulls the strings in this world.

name: A Walk, the Morning After the Storm
summary: There's a story people tell around here.

name: A Worker's Guide to Espionage
summary:
This game was made over a couple of days for the Organising at Work jam. 
 
It's based on the article Basics of Organising from the IWW.

name: A World in Strife: Raiding the Dam
summary: A World in Strife: Raiding the Dam is a single-level PWAD for Strife using the ZDoom source port that was finished in March 2010. It was designed by Adam Woodmansey (Khorus) and uses his own custom music track.

name: A World in Strife 2: Absolute Order
summary:
Strife: Absolute Order is a six-level PWAD for Strife that uses the ZDoom source port and was released in November 2012. It was made by Adam Woodmansey (Khorus) and uses a mixture of his own custom music plus a remix of a music track made by Sarah Mancuso (esselfortium). 
 
Absolute Order received one of the 2012 Cacowards.

name: Awesome Land
summary: A retro platformer collage.

name: A Workplace With No People
summary: You arrive for a job interview, but something doesn't seem right

name: Awakening of Cthulhu
summary: How can a day go so mad? This is the question that runs on our hero Walter’s mind who is a jobless ex-veteran and suffers from PTSD. On the top all, Cthulhu is rising again from his eternal sleep from the deepest shadows of Earth to bring the apocalypse. With Cthulu’s effect, his unstable conditions created a delusional world. Nothing will be the same anymore, especially from Walter’s eyes. Everyone became monsters born from a mind inspired from HP Lovecraft’s books. And Cthulhu calls you! Cthulhu wants you! Go through him! To answer the call of Cthulhu, walk on streets of the city and defend yourself against monsters which await hunting you down. How can a man keep his sanity straight in this delusional world? Let’s take the ticket of an adventure full of madness and discover the delusional world of Walter born from Cthulhu’s awakening. And think that those monsters are real or a mad man attacking people on the streets while living in his delusional hollow.

name: Awfully Good Pizza
summary: A tribute to the pizza-making Flash games of the old Internet in which players must make the worst pizzas they can and rack up as much debt as possible.

name: Awake
summary:
Awake is a game about a cold and dark night out in the woods. The night seems to be endless, and the same can be said about the trials the protagonist Marc has to overcome in order to survive. Prepare to die again and again ... and again!

This game was created over the course of 14 days as part of #AdvJam2016

name: Awkward Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy!

name: A Way to be Dead
summary: A Way to be Dead is an asymmetrical multiplayer (4 vs 1) game where a bewildered doctor is on the hunt for a group of victims who are just trying to escape from a zombie infested hospital. Escape | Kill | Eat...

name: A Walk With Yiayia
summary: A Walk with Yiayia is a light adventure game/visual novel about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk after she's lost her confidence from having a scary fall. Connect through engaging conversations, explore a relaxing environment, and complete microquests in this thoughtful, bite-sized adventure.

name: A Warmer Shade of Summer
summary: You return to the family farm to find it in disrepair. Maybe you have what it takes to bring it back to its former glory? Who knows who you'll meet on you're way? An old friend? That special someone? Anything is possible in Summerset.

name: A World of Little Legends
summary: Back to the 90s ~ but with open world crafting and catboy vikings! The fair comes to town, but at a strange stall you suddenly get trapped in a magical snow globe. Do you build yourself a new life and a cozy farm, or do you try to find a way out?

name: A Wave of Enemies
summary: A Wave of Enemies is an FPS game where the goal is to defend against hordes of monsters. There are 3 types of enemies in the game. With each wave, the speed and number of enemies increases. Use a machine gun to kill enemies. Break your previous record.

name: A Week in the Office: Under the Table
summary: You are hiding beneath your drowsy co-worker's desk. Your goal is to make her climax a certain amount of times each day. Use your hand, office supplies and different tools to stimulate her without getting caught. Whenever you get caught, you have the opportunity to hide for a few minutes.

name: Awesome Mix Tape
summary: Struggle with obsolete tech to load up cracking slices of gaming fun.

name: A Winding Path
summary: A Winding Path is a hand-drawn adventure game about finding the beauty of the world and enjoying the little things.

name: Awakening the Light
summary: This 2D top down RPG follows NoName #1892 as he fights his way through vast amounts of monsters, navigates dangerous dungeons, and searches for the most important thing in his life: answers, while blending the excitement of classic adventure games with the fun and impact of story driven RPGs.

name: A Walk Through Echoes
summary: Accompany an old blind man on his journey in this challenging auditory platformer game. Test your precision platforming skills, reflexes, memory, and puzzle solving in order to progress.

name: A Way to Die
summary: Enter the human body with A Way To Die! Play as a disease that attempts to infect its host by contaminating organs and mutating! Discover new ways to win every time you play with all the different diseases!

name: A Western Drama
summary: A Western Drama is an arcade audio game, without any graphics, in which you only use your ears and a pair of headphones to interact with the environment of the game. Follow a dramatic story in the typical spaghetti-western style.

name: Awesome Puzzle
summary: Awesome Puzzle is an educational game for children in which you have to collect a picture from puzzles. The game has 12 levels, a pleasant atmosphere for children.Good music, nice graphics, mouse control, the game develops memory well.

name: A Way Back
summary: A Way Back is a cute puzzle game where you play as a penguin who pushes or kicks plastic garbage blocks to throw them away in to a trash bin. Explore variety of challenging puzzles with tricky obstacles. Help the penguin to clean the environment around him and find a way back home!

name: A Wake Inn: Rebooked
summary:
They say bad things happen in Silver Inn Hotel. Strange noises. Mysterious flashing lights in the night. Weird figures slithering in the dark.

They say something is about to awake soon. Will you dare to witness it?

A Wake Inn comes for PC in Rebooked version - redesigned, adding new content, additional endings and fully animated models of enemies.

name: Awakener
summary: Fadi has been given permission to visit his Aunt Sylvia for the day - but Auntie Sylvia has a problem, and would like some help fixing it. Join Fadi on a snack sized adventure through a colourful world that is host to a bunch of even more colourful characters!

name: Awesome Zombie Games Bundle
summary:
This bundle contains both zombie games made by Awesome Games Studio.

Yet Another Zombie Defense HD is all about defending yourself against hordes of darkness attacking you every single night. You know this is a lost cause, enemy forces are overwhelming and sooner or later your time will come. So, if you gonna go, do it with style, and pave yourself through piles of fallen monsters before they squash you! There's just one thing that matters - how long can YOU survive?

In I, Zombie you play as the leader of a zombie horde and your goal is to infect all humans on the map. Whenever you infect a human you turn him into a one of your kind and you can use him against armed soldiers. You're also able to command your horde to either attack the enemies, follow you or wait for orders. Each scenario requires tactical approach and careful planning to achieve success.

name: Awaken: Chaos Era
summary: Enter the mythical world of Awaken, an ancient land held together only by the elements that brought it into existence. Peace is now being torn apart as the former King has disturbed the balance and brought the continent to the brink of destruction. As the constant struggle between light and darkness wages on, It's time to join the battle and awaken your inner hero!

name: Awoken: Chapter One of Reverie
summary: In Awoken you will have to weave your way through the horror that is Mount Moira Hospital. You must navigate through obstacle filled halls, fearful dead ends, and the overall confusing structure of the facility. As you try to piece together your broken past and discover what binds you to this hell.

name: A World Abandoned
summary: Explore an abandoned planet, find upgrades, build your character and reveal the truth about what happened to the planet and its people.

name: Awolnation: Megalithic Mayhem
summary: Based on the innovative Claymation style of AWOLNATION's "Not Your Fault" music video, Megalithic Mayhem is an action game with a twist. Choose from comic versions of all those loveable AWOLNATION bandmates: Aaron, Christopher, Hayden, David and Kenny. Each is ready for action with their own unique weapons and special attacks. Use those attacks to beat on aliens, yetis, reptilians, bomb-wielding penguins and samurai snowmen as you try to save the girl! You'll collect powerups as you pummel enemies through three extended levels: Artic, Tropical, and Space. Along the way you'll save your bandmates and unlock them for later use. Intuitive controls put you right in the action, and best of all, the game is 100% free!

name: Awaken: Astral Blade
summary: Weave your own story in this dark fairy tale. In the mysterious ancient ruins, Loretta, a girl who has parasitized by an alien beast, tries to break through the fog and uncover the truth about her fate. Is there any chance of survival in the darkest place?

name: A Wave of Lights
summary:
In a seaside town, Hannah spends her days asleep and her nights wandering the empty beach. Too anxious to hold down a job or go to school, her roommate thinks she's hopeless. Hannah is inclined to agree.

On one of these monotonous nights, a spaceship crashes on the beach! The cute alien inside disrupts Hannah's life... and her entire sense of self.

name: A Waffles Fate
summary: Run waffle, JUST RUN !

name: A western love story but with no horse
summary: A roadtrip with two cowboy lovers

name: A Welcome Shower
summary: A little exploration of rainfall and hope. Includes sound.

name: A Wheel Without a View
summary: ONLY ONE RIDE PER DAY. OPEN UNTIL OTHERWISE.

name: A (W)hole lot of Colors
summary: Match the blocks and create a fitting hole

name: Awer
summary: Frantic hand gesture fighting game.

name: A Weekend at Villa Apate
summary: A point-n-click pixelart adventure game about killers, mad scientists, cultists, ancient god and much more

name: A Walk in the Silent Street
summary: A game about walking in the streets at night.

name: A Walk In A Field
summary: Remember to remember.

name: Awol Ahab
summary: A retro style shmup where every shot lowers the score, but hit and destroryed enemies raise the score.

name: A Winter Story
summary: A breath-taking RPG. In a winter, a studious villager, Holder, leave his hometown and go aboard to find his missed lover.

name: A Walk of Surrender
summary: You win when you give up.

name: Awaken
summary: For the "Daydream" Bitsy Jam

name: A Wonderful Day For Fishing
summary: An experimental horror game made in a weekend, exploring isolation, the uncanny valley, and repetition as core concepts. You play as a lonely man out at sea for a lovely day of fishing. A mood piece.

name: Awakened Evil
summary: Awakened Evil is an action platformer inspired by the classics. Jump and slash your way through intense linear stages that will put your skills to the test. Do you have what it takes to slay all the bosses, and take on evil itself?

name: A white horse is not a horse
summary: Cultivate immortals to pursue the avenue, or raise spirit animals, plant spirit plants, find spirit objects, or complete the so-called destiny, find the way home, find longevity, find the avenue, explore the boundless world of the universe, fight with immortals in mythology.

name: A.W.O.L.
summary:
A.W.O.L. is a first-person, mil-spec shooter developed using the Build engine (Duke Nukem 3D, Ion Fury), specifically a modernized version of the Build Engine based on the "EDuke32" source port which allows for modern hardware acceleration and modern controls while retaining the original 2D pixel sprite graphics.

Originally conceived as a passion project by a small Build Engine mod team in the early 2000's, the game was in development for almost two decades before finally being released for free on Steam in September 2022.

name: A Wholesome Game About Farming
summary: This game is about farming! Just gold ol' planting crops in the daytime, and harvesting them in the daytime with no sinister nighttime gameplay or anything nefarious like that at all.

name: Awesome Cat Puzzle
summary:
Awesome Cat Puzzle is a classic logic game. This cat is a small animal and like a fish, but a bad dog wants to catch him when he tries to get the fish! Be a hero and help to run out this awesome cat. You must arrange tiles to escape. This is a really survival journey but you can help the cat!
Please don't block on any levels and try to finish a game because in the other reason the dog catches the cat!

name: AWK: Adventures of Walker King
summary: AWK follows the journey of a young DJ who returns home from boarding school to figure out his path in life. Join Walker as he navigates life in LA with his best friends, finds love, and discovers secrets - all while trying to balance his growth and newfound fame as DJ NO1.

name: A War of a Madman's Making
summary: You are subordinate to a deranged dictator and must plan his doomed invasion in this text-based RPG / Visual Novel. Navigate the shark-filled waters of the Great Leader's presidential cabinet, and try to save your family and survive the purges in a world of power-hungry leaders and nuclear warfare.

name: Awaits: 10H
summary:
Awaits;10H is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It is a prequel to the game Hikensha.
It follows the story of a young boy named Yarishi, who is having a hard time with many familiar problems, but that's about to change, as unknown forces lurk around the house and his dreams watching him constantly. Your goal is to collect effects as well as eight seeds that are scattered throughout the dream world.

name: A Weekend in Puzzleburg
summary: A Weekend in Puzzleburg is a cozy slice-of-life role-playing game. No need to fight monsters or save the world from impending doom - you've merely booked a relaxing weekend getaway in a town known for its puzzles. Welcome to Puzzleburg!

name: Awakening: The Redleaf Forest & Awakening: The Golden Age
Awake
summary: Awake is an isometric puzzle game about a young girl named Aya who is suffering from insomnia. Aya must navigate various obstacles in her path as she moves between different planes of consciousness. Join Aya on her journey to explore the depths of her dreamscape and uncover the root of her anxiety.

name: Away From Life
summary: You are left alone with yourself in the middle of the Indian Ocean, fighting for survival with the wildlife of the nearest islands and the ocean elements.

name: A Webbing Journey
summary: A Webbing Journey is a physics-based sandbox game where you play as a cute little spider. Explore a giant house, create crazy web structures, and complete oversized chores in creative and fun ways.

name: Aworg
summary: Mobile phone port of the Sega Game Toshokan release. Released for J-Sky 50KB mobile devices through the Petit*Sega portal.

name: AWP Mode
summary:
Love online shooting games and always go for the sniper rifle? Get ready for epic sniper games battles against other players. No other guns allowed! A huge arsenal of dozens of sniper rifles and lots of heroes to choose from will keep your itchy trigger finger happy
Snipe other players in online battles and play with friends! Show the world you're the sharpest shot online, even against top-class sniper pros.

name: Awakening of Legend
summary: Awakening of Legend is a free, retro-inspired, rogue-like adventure with randomized loot, transferable perks and combat inspired by the Active Time Battle (ATB) system from old school JRPGs.

name: A Walk With My Dog
summary: Go on a walk with me and my dog Ezio. Play fetch, tug of war, explore & enjoy the sounds of nature!

name: A Week
summary: A Week is a side scrolling adventure game. All you need to do is take care of your dog.

name: Awesome Platformers Bundle
summary: Check out our games that have kept thousands of our players entertained!

name: A Werewolf Opportunity, Obviously
summary: On the heels of his best friend getting married and tired of letting all his relationships fizzle out before they even get started, 20-something Eddie decides he's going to find a boyfriend and give it his all in a serious relationship! But in a town where magic is lurking just below the surface, can Eddie make it work — or will the more human side of life hold him back again?

name: Away in the Woods
summary: Away in the Woods is an upcoming RPG Maker XP game about a woman who lives alone in the woods. Spend three days, each a quarter century apart, in her shoes, learning the woods and shaping her reputation in the nearby town. What will she be known as?

name: Awaken
summary: In Awaken, a punk world that combines 2D and 3D, the protagonist wakes up unexpectedly. On the way to escape, he shuttles among various forces in the world to complete various tasks. This is an action adventure game with RPG elements, full of surprises, waiting for you to explore and discover.

name: AwakeMUD
summary:
AwakeMUD is a MUD set in the year is 2064, and the world has been reforged in the fires of magic, technology, and greed. Orks, Trolls, Elves, and other races straight out of fantasy roam the streets, along with new and unfamiliar mutations inflicted on the populace in a traumatic event known as the SURGE. Cybernetic implants and arcane workings grant incredible power to those who can afford to wield them, and information - the most valuable resource in 2064– is stolen and traded by expert hackers with homemade VR rigs. Dominating this landscape are the mega-corporations, wielding nigh-limitless political clout and conducting shadow wars while an unsuspecting populace happily consumes their products.

As a Shadowrunner, you are one of the freelance agents hired to do various organizations' dirty work (and turn a healthy profit in the process). There are many paths you can take on your road to success, and many ways you can grow in power and influence in the Seattle community.

name: Awkward 2
summary: Awkward 2 is the adult multiplayer party game filled with dark, hilarious & sometimes downright disturbing questions. Laugh, debate, defend and find out things you never wanted to know about your friends and Twitch viewers!

name: Awakening: Into the Stars
summary: Become the one and only Captain of the Colony Ship Oberon as it cruises towards the Planet Zaenus with a single goal in mind: to colonise it and make it into a brand-new home for humanity. Such a huge task might seem daunting, but don’t worry, for you are not alone on your journey...

name: A World With out You
summary: A World With (out) You is an Otome game by Voltage Inc.

name: Awesome Asteroids
summary:
Awesome Asteroids pays homage to the arcade classics of the time and enhances the gameplay to a full 3d experience.

You'll blast through waves of asteroids using lasers, rockets, and gatling guns while trying to keep bases and other structures from taking damage. Grab shield power ups to charge your shields which will protect you from asteroids and mines. You’ll need to take out enemy ships before they can destroy your bases while avoiding their defenses.

name: A World to Win
summary: A Cold War real-time grand strategy game. Players lead a country through the revolutions and superpower conflicts of the late 20th century, competing in the space race and nuclear arms race, destabilizing and overthrowing rival powers to expand their spheres of influence.

name: Aw Heck, War!
summary: A Single-Player Indie VR shooter sandbox war game

name: Awaken Alone
summary:
This original adventure game is a “tip of the cap” to the point and click games of the early 90’s. Adventure game fans will enjoy the classic point and click experience, and the most perceptive players can also experience zen inspired philosophy woven subliminally through the dialogue and puzzles.

Only you can find the missing crew and answer the question of what happened on the Artemis Agroterra III. Solve puzzles to explore the ship, and figure out why you never made it home. Did 'Lunar Corp.' set the crew up to fail or did something else happen in the far flung reaches of the Milky Way? Piece together the clues and find out how you came to be the sole survivor aboard the floating enigma of the 'Agroterra III' in Awaken Alone.

name: Away to the Stars
summary: A procedurally generated twin stick survival RPG. Battle, explore, loot, solve, communicate, live in an endless universe. Discover your past and travel your way to GAIA where humanity can be rebuilt or not...

name: Awara
summary: Awara is a platform game whose story takes place in French Guiana. The goal of the game is to collect awaras while avoiding rotten or toxic awaras. To do this, you will have to jumd and slip in order to evolve in the forest.

name: Awareness
summary: Horror adventure game with an emphasis on the story, in which, by interacting with the environment and characters, you have to help the doll-boy stop the terrible events that he himself is to blame.

name: Awkward Goalie
summary:
Call it soccer or football, either way in this silly physics game you don't score goals, but you do progress by catching balls.
Tap and throw, dash your character around to catch and hit balls and not let your team down. Avoid explosive balls, collect coin balls and crash into minigame balls.
Progress through the game and unlock new gameplay mechanics, like moving gates, different types of gates, different types of balls (golden, minigame, etc) and some more.
To support your inner desire for self-expression, the game contains variety of characters to choose from.

name: Awita: Journey of Hope
summary: Awita: journey of hope is side-scroller metroidvania about a girl who saves her village from a terrible epidemic. She has to explore the big dangerous world, meet new friends and enemies and find out the secrets of the kingdom.

name: A Whisper in the Twilight: Chapter One
summary: An ancient moon shrouded in mystery. Alien enigmas. An adventure beyond the Earth.

name: Awesome Eats
summary: Sort, stack, pack and plate a rainbow of fresh-from-the-garden foods! And now recycle items after lunch!

name: Awakening Sarah
summary: Awakening Sarah is an upcoming sequel to Dreaming Sarah, a 2D platformer with an emphasis on exploration. Unravel the dreams and realities of Sarah, a girl who's recovering from a coma, while helping her understand the world around her and herself.

name: Away Times
summary: It's a vampire survive-like game where you survive running away from monsters. If you can survive for 30 minutes, you can win. When a crashed gray man lands on a strange planet, you are very curious about where this is. But first you have to survive hostile creatures.

name: Away From Home
summary: A Rhythm based RPG experience. Providing detailed pixel art and expressive animation. Experience a fun world with lots of colorful characters. Come and disrupt their peace!

name: A World of Wishes
summary: Nicole has been traumatized by the murder of her mother and father. Haunted by images of a memory she can't recall. Follow Nicole and Gabby's lives as they try and put the pieces together that are tearing at them daily. Something or someone is lurking out in the darkness. Waiting.

name: Awakened
summary: The world has never been the same ever since the outbreak happened.

name: Awakening
summary: Awakening is a first person experimental puzzle game with a unique gameplay based on pattern recognition. Guide a soul that decided to find meaning by solving puzzle machines with videos. Use inductive reasoning to discover the challenges while exploring an oneiric environment.

name: Awesome Pea 3
summary: Awesome Pea is a fast precision platformer where you must run&jump through a series of challenging stages

name: A War On Christmas
summary: After reports of a mass slaughtering of good little children by a crazed man in a Santa suit, you track them down to one final stand-off. This is A War On Christmas...

name: A Wanderer's Tale: Celebration of the Century
summary:
A bush wanderer exploring the native Australian bushland is approached by a Cockatoo who kindly asks for the wanderer’s assistance.

The protector of the area, a Crocodile, is turning 100 years old and all the local resident animals want to craft a ceremonial crown to present to her at the Celebration of a Century billabong gathering, before dusk.

Unfortunately, the animals cannot do it in time without the wanderer’s help!

name: Award Winning Indie Gems 4-in-1
summary: Endling – Extinction is Forever: As the last mother fox on Earth, your cubs need all your care to survive in a merciless world on the brink of destruction. Explore what is left of nature and defend your family against all threats.

name: Awoken Madness
summary: Huge metal/runic fortress built into the mountains, with a high monster count.

name: Awakening
summary:
After the epic horrors of DOOM and The Beginning of the End parts I and II you are a broken man. Demons haunt your mind and plague your sleep. Unable to cope, you are sent to a UAC medical facility that also happens to double as a radioactive toxic waste treatment plant. Here, along with the few other surviving scarred space marines, you are prescribed cryno-therapy. Your body is placed in suspended animation while your mind is flushed with chemicals and stimulants in order to cleanse the horrors from your psyche.
But something is wrong. As soon as you are put into stasis, you awaken again. Things are different. The building seems deserted and in shambles. No sounds are heard. You step out of your chrinochamber to a familiar smell. The smell of rancid flesh. The smell of death. You draw your pistol, which you never let leave your side no matter what the circumstances. You wonder if this nightmare will ever be over. You get the sense the worst is only beginning.

name: Awarded Platformer Bundle
summary: Get the award-winning platformer games "In Between" and "Toby: The Secret Mine" in this awesome bundle!

name: AWA 2024
summary: AWA 2024 is a fast paced shoot-em-up featuring modern military aircraft. Choose one of the ten fighter aircraft and take the battle to the skies throughout nine action-packed stages each with their own special end-level boss.

name: A War On Christmas: Part 2
summary: A War On Christmas: Part 2 is a 12 map sequel to last year's Christmas rampage. Featuring the things you loved about the original and much, much more!

name: A Wolf In Sheep's Clothing
summary: A Wolf In Sheep's Clothing is a murder-mystery visual novel that takes place in a French high school. You play as Mercredi, an aloof teenage girl who finds that her life is quickly and continuously going awry when your friend goes missing.

name: A Winter Haunting
summary: Everlyn Sterling, a young woman tasked by her grandmother to take care of a historic mansion, finds herself entangled in a mystery involving supernatural forces. Join her in this point-and-click style game to uncover the secrets behind this landmark!

name: A Wizardry Enchantment
summary: A boys love mobile game.

name: Awe
summary: Your feelings and logic are very important in this game. Feel like a detective in a strange and extremely dangerous place. Investigate the loss of people, simultaneously solving puzzles and trying not to fall into the trap.

name: Awesome Jazz Clicker
summary: The girl invites to her home, turn on jazz and ...

name: Away from the light
summary: You find yourself in a critical situation on the brink of departure, without awareness indicating whether you have departed from the world of the living. In this surreal and mysterious dimension, your actions dictate the fate of this event, whether it's the end or a new beginning.

name: A Weekend Trip
summary: A short narrative about a trip with friends over the weekend. Play as River as they throughout the trip. Choose what River does during the trip. Will they hang out with their friends? Will they explore the cabin? Or will they choose to just let the trip pass by as quickly as possible.

name: Awful Marco Bros
summary: Awful Marco Bros is a short game where you play as the enemies and try to beat the protagonist.

name: A Witch in Time: Yamada-kun to Nananin no Majo
summary: At Suzaku High School, there has been generation after generation of witches that hold special powers. Ryu Yamada holds the special power to copy a witch's power and he's been using this to solve the many issues that pop-up at the school. One day, Ryu and his friends are hanging out at the Occult Club as usual. But when Miyabi brings up a rumor involving time travel, Ryu brushes it off as being unrelated to witches and their powers. On the way home from school, just outside the gates, Ryu feels someone tap on his shoulder. He turns around, but there's nobody there. Thinking it must have been his imagination, he continues on his way home only to find his house is gone! It turns out, he's travelled in time!

name: A Witch's Game
summary: Seeking solace from the hunt of the blasphemed, a witch has made a game of tarot cards. She uses the intentions of her enemies against themselves, redirecting opposing attacks to work in her favor instead.

name: Awakening of the Eclipse
summary: There's a legend in the town where you grew up - "the vampire sealed for five hundred years will be awoken when the Sun blinks and the Earth moves." Of course, it’s just a story…

name: Awful Kidnapper
summary:
In Awful Kidnapper, you play as a horror fan, living deep in the woods. One day you decide to kidnap someone to make your dark desires come true.

But, guess what - It's not that easy to keep someone hostage!

Your victims are weirder than you'd think!

name: A Way Up
summary: Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of "A Way Up," a fast-paced 2D pixel art platformer created during an intense 72-hour game jam. In this adrenaline-pumping adventure, you start on a precarious platform, only to plummet into the depths of a mysterious cave. Your objective? Ascend to the exit as quickly as possible!

name: Awagame
summary: Explore the world's oceans with a sea turtle that has the ability to inflate bubbles! Bubbles can be used as bullets or shields. But be careful not to over-inflate the bubbles and suffocate! Watch your timing and jump out of the water to breathe. Turtles are lung-breathers.

name: Awaken: Hentai Dice
summary: Awaken: Hentai Dice is an exciting adventure for adults. Magic exists among us, but is not available to everyone. Fulfill the prophecy using ancient dice, bring male magic back to our world and don't get caught by the Inquisition.

name: (A)woken
summary:
Alpha prototype of a mecha first person shooter made in godot.
It features hand drawn anime style character sprites, an endless arcade mode and a single player story mode.

name: A Walk in the Park
summary: There is a fireworks event in the evening and your friend knows just the right place to watch it. All you have to do is get there through this perfectly normal park. Just follow the arrows and you'll reach your destination. Eventually. How hard can that be?

name: Awesome: The Game
summary: A choose-your-own-adventure game about dying in unique ways.

name: Awesome Tanks
summary: Prepare to unleash a war! Smash enemy tanks, destroy bosses, find secret rooms full of bonuses. Collect coins to upgrade your tank's stats, purchase and improve weapons!

name: Awesome Tanks 2
summary: Defeat enemy tanks, collect coins, and destroy the enemy base in order to clear each level. Spend your money wisely to upgrade your tank with better armor, weapons, visibility, and more.

name: A Whale's Journey
summary:
Experience the journey of Giuliana, one of the most fascinating creatures to inhabit the waters of the Mediterranean. From the National Museums of Matera comes 'A Whale’s Journey,' depicting the life of a cetacean that becomes a metaphor for human existence.

You'll get to guide Giuliana through every stage of her life: from birth, navigating her first encounters in the marine environment, to adulthood and motherhood, where she cares for her young, up until reaching full maturity. A journey that unveils the fantastic marine setting in the Pleistocene era, featuring imaginative creatures and dangers to avoid, starting from Giuliana's birth until her disappearance. You'll discover the thrilling discovery of her skeleton in Lucanian territory, along the banks of the San Giuliano dam. A life's journey from the Pleistocene to the present, traversing geological eras, ocean depths, encountering new friends, and monstrous creatures.

name: A Witch Shall be Born
summary: The witch Morgana, found King Arthurs' sword Excalibur hidden in a lake. Now the sword is somewhere in Greenland, in Morgana's hideout, and Lara is looking for it.

name: Awesome Game
summary: Four stories by children, turned into this chaotic and extremely awesome game! Made on commission for Kulturverket and Humlab Umeå.

name: A Work of Art
summary: A dark, witty, psychological thriller in the horror genre, A Work of Art presents a 1-2 hour story-driven experience with Visual Novel features and RPG elements. Follow a colorful cast of quirky characters through a twisted tale of beauty and darkness; All to the sound of a Dark Original soundtrack.

name: Awaken Infinity
summary: A top-down RPG with visual novel elements. Wake up in a futuristic room with no memory, and unravel the mysteries of your past.

name: Awaria
summary: Welcome to the tunnel maintenance crew. If the generators fail, it's your job to fix them. Check what's wrong, craft all the needed parts and deliver them. It's simple. Just stay clear of anything that randomly cracks bolts of electricity, spews fire, throws sharp pieces of scrap at high-velocity or radiates with ominous green light.

name: A Woman for All Seasons
summary: A short 1 room adventure game visual novel

name: A Waddleful Life
summary: A sweet little game where you play as a duck and raise ducklings.

name: A War On Christmas 3: World War C
summary: The third installment in the "A War on Christmas Series" featuring 12 maps of Christmas Mania.

name: A Whole Wolfrush
summary: Four friends battle their way across space to claim a once-in-a-lifetime wish. Their lives are in your hands.

name: A Week in the Life of Asocial Giraffe
summary: “A Week in the Life of Asocial Giraffe” is a point-and-click stealth game where the goal is to make sure nobody talks to you so that your head does not explode. You'll get to experience an average week of Giraffe's life as he does exciting things on his to-do list, such as going to the laundromat, peruses antique stores, purchasing groceries, and working out at the gym, all while making sure the incredibly sociable citizens of Friendly City never have a chance to speak with him for fear of losing your head.

name: Awkward Valley
summary: Welcome to Awkward Valley! Plan your day, tackle strange activities, and unlock bizarre new options as you go. Gym? Therapy? Vending machine snacks? It’s up to you! Featuring Awkward Yeti’s weird and wonderful characters in a totally normal town.

name: A Whisper in the Twilight: Chapter Two
summary: A first-person story-driven game. A dark sci-fi adventure. Solve the riddles of an ancient moon and discover what your destiny will be.

name: A Way Home Uzy's Journey
summary: Uzy's navigation system got damaged in a storm, now he and his friends are separated from each other and their home. Join Uzy solving puzzles and help out others along the way.

name: A Wicked Game
summary:
In A Wicked Game, the rules are unclear or incomplete. There may or may not be feedback. Patterns will be hard to find. A Wicked Game demands the player know things which are never taught, demands that they contort themselves to a constantly-changing control scheme, and success requires mastery combined with luck. The characters you meet are deliberately inhospitable. They are impatient, rude, and inconsistent. They will help you and harm you, but it will be unclear which is happening. Trust is hard to find here.

Good luck.

name: Awake
summary: A tactile platformer game haiku by droqen where you play as a creature walking around a cave.

name: Awaysis
summary: The ultimate dungeon brawler. A revolutionary, physics-fueled throwdown where you’ll jump, slide, and collide on your adventure to restore peace to the Awaysis - an ancient floating relic under attack by forces of great darkness!

name: Awrak
summary: Build combos with your characters and cards to reach MASSIVE numbers! Choose from unique characters, stack powerful synergies, and unleash a storm of projectiles in this roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Away Team
summary: Away Team is a new Oxygen Not Included adventure. Take control of a Duplicant and harness a new world where every tile is simulated.

name: A Wake Between Worlds
summary:
In this action-roguelite you play as the spirit of a fisherman named Theo, who died at sea and desires to go back to his old life on the other side of the ocean.

Since you are stuck in the Drift, the land between the living and the dead, you will encounter other restless spirits who've been dwelling and manifesting into abominations, preventing you from reaching your home.

Using your harpoon, you must fight your way from island to island with your fishing boat to collect resources, so you can craft upgrades according to your play style and be able to defeat the restless abominations.

name: Awaking Beauty
summary: Let’s save the world through dreaming—together!"Awaking Beauty" is a two-character roguelite action game that blends sci-fi and fantasy. You’ll play as selected high school girls piloting dream-diving mechas to rescue those trapped in the dream world.

name: Awurda First Wave
summary: Awurda First Wave is an action adventure game. The last remaining human is caught in the middle of a war to save the world from evil creatures. Defeat your enemies with fast and exciting fighting mechanics. Overcome various obstacles and defeat difficult enemies to advance to the next levels.

name: A Way With Words
summary: Craft words one letter at a time, in any direction. In A Way With Words, you even get points for words within words. Spell as many words as you can to complete the goal.

name: Awakeroots
summary: Awakeroots is a passion project—crafted by two brothers who combine creativity with a deep love for Slavic culture and storytelling. It’s not just a game—it’s a journey into a world that could have been… and now awakens again.

name: Awss
summary: Immerse yourself in a first-person shooter where Low-poly cartoonish visuals clash with a sinister, gloomy atmosphere. Armed with a massive arsenal of weapons, you'll blast through hordes of Enemies, infiltrate a sinister lab, and fight your way to the escape point.

name: Awake
summary: The world has been destroyed by war and governments have fallen apart. Zombies are everywhere An environment full of mystery and terror, you have to find a way to escape you can craft bombs and health or buy from the shop. You just have to think about killing

name: Awakening of Solutio
summary: Venture into the heart of a fairytale forest fraught with peril in Awakening of Solutio, a captivating 2D platform game. Play as Solutio, accompanied by your loyal forest ghost companion, Ali, on a quest to restore balance to a land consumed by darkness. Your mission: to liberate the trapped forest ghosts, the very essence of the forest's life force.

name: A Wild Last Boss Appeared!: Black-Winged Survivor
summary: The first-ever game adaptation of a hugely popular IP "A Wild Last Boss Appeared!" is a massively popular dark fantasy isekai series with over 1.

name: A Week at Polar's Buffet
summary:
You are the brand new nightguard of Polar's Artic Frenzy Buffet. After the previous one retired from the position. You will spend your whole first week in this nearly run down place, make sure nothing gets in, and nothing gets out.

Though, the animatronic mascots' programming is starting to get a bit faulty, if you get hurt, will it be by the errors in the code, or the ghosts of the hidden past?

This game has a 2.5D artstyle, with 3d environments and 2d characters. The building is 3D Modelled, the props are 3D and 2D, and the characters are 2D.

name: A World of Keflings: The Curse of the Zombiesaurus
summary: Put a horde of Spooklings to work gathering bones, brimstone and slug shampoo in this macabre night-time land! Horrifying creations await you as you build your creepy kingdom and work out how to deal with the largest, most horrifying creation of all... the Zombiesaurus!

name: A Whisper of Fall: Jinyiwei
summary: "A Whisper of Fall: Jinyiwei" is an ARPG set in the Ming Dynasty. Play as a Jinyiwei (Imperial Guard) with martial art, lightness skill and the unique deduction ability, across shifting timelines and sandbox levels to weave the destiny of yourself and the dynasty.

name: Awaken
summary: Awaken brings Lovecraftian horror to the beloved 2D side scroller genre. Make your way through the strange forest while encountering inexcplicable forces and try to keep your sanity as you piece together the mystery of your sister's disappearance.

name: Awakening
summary: Put an end to the chaos in this 2D action platformer! Engage in hand-to-hand combat against the gangs of Everseam, earn upgrades, and take down bosses vying for control of the city

name: A World of Keflings: Sugar, Spice and Not So Nice
summary: The chocolate volcano, caramel lake, cotton candy forest and gingerbread Keflings are in danger of being devoured! Harvest candy, bake building pieces, and assemble edible buildings to help save the Gingerlings and drive a sinister wizard from their kingdom!

name: A World At War Tactics
summary: Immerse yourself in intense World War II turn-based tactical battles with a charming pixel art style. Modify the terrain to your advantage and enjoy a unique isometric perspective as you lead your troops to victory.

name: A Witch's Stop
summary:
A Witch’s Stop is a rhythm game where you play as members of a band full of teen witches. It consists of a gameplay fusion of music and magic where you cast spells along with the rhythm.

Take a peek into the cozy seaside village where there’s magic, witches, and… high school. In this coming-of-age story, follow three witches through a journey of self-discovery as they try to find their way through the pressure of an unchanging magic society. How do they balance the duality of a normal life and a constant magical action?

name: A Whittle Tale
summary: A Whittle Tale is a whimsical 3D platformer where you jump, glide, and swap ability-granting prosthetic tails to overcome handcrafted wooden worlds and collect Obal coins to travel between realms.
